body:
i am back only here at the forums not in the game yet since i miss you guys! :'( it's really hard to play tf2 without all of you with me so i decided to pay a visit here since my tf2 is currently not working. ask me anything what happened to me and btw, what happened here? 

oh btw, you can request me to create sfm posters in tf2 if you want me to just fill up this list:

map:
class:
style:
cosmetics:
team:
